坰字的基本解释

坰
jiōng
离城远的郊野。

坰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiōng］
［《廣韻》古螢切，平青，見。］
“冋1”的今字。亦作“埛1”。
远郊，野外。

坰字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　坰； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页226第29
〔古文〕冋【唐韻】古螢切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】涓熒切，?音扃。【爾雅·釋地】林外謂之坰。【詩·魯頌】在坰之野。【左思·吳都賦】目龍川而帶坰。　又地名。【尚書序】湯歸自夏，至于大坰。【註】大坰，未詳所在，當在定陶向亳之閒。【正字通】大坰作大行，非。　又叶葵營切，音瓊。【謝靈運·初去郡詩】理櫂遄還期，遵渚騖修坰。叶上迎平，下明英。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　坰; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 226 29
〔古文〕冋【Tang Yun】Gu Yingqie 【Jiyun】【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】Jianyingqie,? Yin Xun. 【Erya·Shidi】Lin Wai is called Zhilu. 【Poetry·Lu Song】In the Yezhiye. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Look at the dragon and lead the river.　Also place name. [Shangshu preface] Tang returns to Xia, as to Da Lao. [Note] Da Lao, where it is not specified, should be at the leisure of Dingtao to Bo. [Zhengzitong] Dalai is a great line, no.　Ye Kuiying cut again, Yin Qiong. 【Xie Lingyun·Chu Qujun Poetry】Li Zhaoxiu pays back the date, Zunzhuxiu Xiu. Ye Shangyingping, Xia Mingying.
